body:
Add a `--drop-in <shell>` option to `spack dev-build`. This option will automatically run a `spack build-env <spec> -- <shell>` at the end of a `dev-build`, e.g. to quickly drop-and-devel into a build phase of a package.

Example usage:
```
spack dev-build --before cmake --drop-in bash openpmd-api@develop
```

- [x] fix issue in spec
- [x] rebase after #14699
title: dev-build: --drop-in <shell>
